assessments.status_rationale: No official U.S. government press release on a finalized TikTok/ByteDance resolution is cited in today’s coverage.
The late-October FOMC decision has not been released; articles discuss potential outcomes (including a cut) but provide no decision.
No report indicates the Nikkei 225 has reached 50,000; coverage only notes Asia markets dipping ahead of meetings.
China’s October NBS industrial profits release is not out yet and is not referenced in today’s news.
Hurricane Melissa coverage focuses on forecast/landfall; no catastrophe modeler loss estimates are cited.
There is no mention of a new DHS/ICE PIA or SORN explicitly covering AI-enabled social media monitoring.
HSBC’s Q3 2025 results are not reported in today’s bullets; the announcement is expected by Oct 30.
No definitive agreement announcement from Novartis regarding Avidity Biosciences is referenced.
There is no report of a Canada Gazette, Part II order imposing Customs Tariff surtaxes on U.S. goods.
No settlement data for ICE Endex TTF front-month prices is provided in today’s news.
